document_data.name: Hidden Glades
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hidden Glades''' was a temple dedicated to [[Moander]], the Rotting God.
document_data.Location: The temple was located within the [[Chondalwood]] near the settlement of [[Torsch]].
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Dalchatha Maereegh]], the [[Mouth of Moander]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], was in charge of the temple.
